nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 7/13/2023
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 6/29/2023 at 9:30 PM (UTC) / 2:30 PM (PST) in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/NJtT9grz5E) within the #omi-weekly-meeting channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions channel to manage a speaker queue, post links, and for any sidebar discussions.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

We have a bit of a problem due to DST, since the meeting time changes differently in different parts of the world

## Agenda: 
- Respond to MSFT_physics comments: https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics/issues/17


## Backlog:
* OMI Vehicles Extensions Research
* OMI / MX Components Extension
* We discussed https://openmv.org (Open Metaverse Foundation) and how we can synergize with their efforts. Should we make a showcase of our projects to open up a broader discussion?
* jin - proposals how to make our specs and work more accessible to others. showcase gltf models
* Review pull requests https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pulls
* [EXT_skin_humanoid](https://github.com/takahirox/EXT_skin_humanoid)
* [OMI_link](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_link)
* [OMI_spawn_point](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_spawn_point)
* Review [MSFT_physics](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics)
  * [glTF_Physics_Blender_Exporter](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics_Blender_Exporter)
  * [glTF_Physics_Godot_Importer](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics_Godot_Importer)
* Licensing Extension https://twitter.com/superhoge/status/1596757861882740736
* [KHR_audio / Khronos feedback](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2137)
  * [gltf-sample-assets](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF-Sample-Models/pull/360)
* [Third Room Extensions](https://github.com/matrix-org/thirdroom/pull/469)
* [glXF](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glXF/blob/main/specification/2.0/README.md)
* Show and tell
* Create next weeks agenda

To propose another item for the agenda, comment below (preferably before the meeting).

We discussed the MSFT physics spec.
I wrote a draft response here:
https://gist.github.com/lyuma/53827de274f0144537b33b71ec828155
I decided to hold of on replying it, because I felt it would be good to do research into existing physics engines to assist us in making a reasonable proposal.

nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 6/22/2023 #173
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 6/22/2023 at 9:30 PM (UTC) / 2:30 PM (PST) in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/NJtT9grz5E) within the #omi-weekly-meeting channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions channel to manage a speaker queue, post links, and for any sidebar discussions.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

We have a bit of a problem due to DST, since the meeting time changes differently in different parts of the world

## Agenda: 
â€¢ OMI_collider updates: https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/171


## Backlog:
* OMI Vehicles Extensions Research
* OMI / MX Components Extension
* We discussed https://openmv.org (Open Metaverse Foundation) and how we can synergize with their efforts. Should we make a showcase of our projects to open up a broader discussion?
* jin - proposals how to make our specs and work more accessible to others. showcase gltf models
* Review pull requests https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pulls
* [EXT_skin_humanoid](https://github.com/takahirox/EXT_skin_humanoid)
* [OMI_link](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_link)
* [OMI_spawn_point](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_spawn_point)

  * [glTF_Physics_Blender_Exporter](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics_Blender_Exporter)
  * [glTF_Physics_Godot_Importer](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics_Godot_Importer)

* [KHR_audio / Khronos feedback](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2137)
  * [gltf-sample-assets](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF-Sample-Models/pull/360)
* [Third Room Extensions](https://github.com/matrix-org/thirdroom/pull/469)
* [glXF](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glXF/blob/main/specification/2.0/README.md)
* Show and tell
* Create next weeks agenda

To propose another item for the agenda, comment below (preferably before the meeting).

In the meeting we voted on 

Replace OMI_collider with OMI_physics_shape #171
 - https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/171
and
OMI_physics_body: Add a center of mass property #167
- https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pull/167

Both were approved and merged.

nodes.title: OMI glTF Working Group Meeting 6/15/2023
nodes.body:
This meeting is on 6/15/2023 at 9:30 PM (UTC) / 2:30 PM (PST) in the [OMI Discord](https://discord.gg/NJtT9grz5E) within the #omi-weekly-meeting channel. During the meeting, we will be using the #omi-gltf-extensions channel to manage a speaker queue, post links, and for any sidebar discussions.

To be notified of this meeting and others, subscribe to the [OMI Meetings and Events Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/1?cid=Y18wZHB1Z2Y5ZjgzZXE0cWVrbWI2b21xYmptZ0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t) or add yourself to the @omi-gltf-subgroup role in the #roles channel of the OMI Discord.

We have a bit of a problem due to DST, since the meeting time changes differently in different parts of the world

## Agenda:
* OMI Physics Extensions VS MSFT Extensions
  * https://github.com/omigroup/omigroup/discussions/393
  * Khronos Feedback
* Lightmap extension comparisons. Action items?
* OMI physics vehicles extension discussion
* OMI_physics_joint PRs:
  * https://github.com/omigroup/glTF-Validator/pull/2
  * https://github.com/omigroup/glTF-Validator/pull/3
  * https://github.com/omigroup/omi-godot/pull/1
* [Roblox glTF importer](https://devforum.roblox.com/t/3d-importer-support-for-gltf-files-beta/2320761)
  * [Outreach for OMI extensions](https://twitter.com/arobertlong/status/1656776528204816384)
* [EXT_manifold](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2286) 
* [OMI_personality quotes property](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/issues/163)
* [KHR_audio comments](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2137#pullrequestreview-1412202653)
* [OMI_collider trimesh primitives](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/issues/164)

## Backlog:
* OMI Vehicles Extensions Research
* OMI / MX Components Extension
* We discussed https://openmv.org (Open Metaverse Foundation) and how we can synergize with their efforts. Should we make a showcase of our projects to open up a broader discussion?

* Review pull requests https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/pulls

* [OMI_spawn_point](https://github.com/omigroup/gltf-extensions/tree/main/extensions/2.0/OMI_spawn_point)
* Review [MSFT_physics](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics)
  * [glTF_Physics_Blender_Exporter](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics_Blender_Exporter)
  * [glTF_Physics_Godot_Importer](https://github.com/eoineoineoin/glTF_Physics_Godot_Importer)
* Licensing Extension https://twitter.com/superhoge/status/1596757861882740736
* [KHR_audio / Khronos feedback](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF/pull/2137)
  * [gltf-sample-assets](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF-Sample-Models/pull/360)
* [Third Room Extensions](https://github.com/matrix-org/thirdroom/pull/469)
* [glXF](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glXF/blob/main/specification/2.0/README.md)
* Show and tell
* Create next weeks agenda
